/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of green trees that add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
